trans-unit.source: Represents a callout annotation.
A callout annotation is the only annotation that draws a connection between the annotation position and the anchor point.
This class can also display text and automatically calculate its required size.
Different callout styles are supported.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the annotation position alignment to the anchor point.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value that represents the alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
Gets or sets the offset that the X-position of the annotation has from the anchor point.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
A `double` value that represents the offset of the annotation's X-position from the anchor point.
Gets or sets the offset that the Y-position of the annotation has from the anchor point.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
A `double` value that represents the offset of the annotation's Y-position from the anchor point.
Gets or sets the annotation type name.
For internal use, should not be used.
For internal use, should not be used.
The annotation type.
Gets or sets the background color of the annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets the annotation background gradient style.

Two colors are used to draw the gradient, and are set with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value used to draw the annotation background.
Gets or sets the background hatch style of the annotation.

Two colors are used to draw the hatching, and are set with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> value used to draw the annotation background.
Gets or sets the secondary color for the annotation background.

This color is used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> properties are used.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> enumeration value used in conjunction with a primary color to draw the annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.
Gets or sets the style for a callout line anchor cap.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.CalloutAnchorCap%2A> property sets the style of the anchor cap for the line that connects the annotation with the anchor point.

This property is only applicable when a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle.SimpleLine> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle.Borderline> callout style is used.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the style to use for a callout line anchor cap.
Gets or sets the annotation callout style.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets the annotation line color.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation line.
Gets or sets the annotation line style.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value used to draw the annotation line.
Gets or sets the line width of the annotation.
An `integer` value that represents the annotation line width, in pixels.
